directions: Combine cashew milk, cashews, lemon juice, chia seeds, onion powder, salt, and granulated garlic in a blender. Blend on high speed until smooth. Add dried onion, dill, and parsley; pulse a few times more.
Refrigerate until well chilled, at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chia seeds, or more to taste
title: Vegan Dilly Ranch
